content.query:
SELECT TOP 100
        JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.id') AS id,
        JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.first_name') AS first_name,
        JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.last_name') AS last_name,
        JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.email') AS email,
        JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.gender') AS gender
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakes4rvjic.dfs.core.windows.net/files/json_data/MOCK_DATA.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a' -- line seperated json data
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS [result]
